IntroText: Good afternoon young lady.  I've never|seen you before, are you a new student?
Please don't make too much noise in the library.
Yummy!  My little pet girl is back.|I hope you remember our deal.
Here you are!  I've been searching for|you for hours.  How did you escape?
So my "good for nothing" pet has came back.|I hope you learned something from isolation.
I hope you learned something from isolation.|Are you now staying away from trouble?
You must be COMMON_PLAYERNAME.|Teacher Mildred told me about you.
Young lady, I hope you will not fight again and|that you've learned a lesson from your detention.
Young lady, I hope you will not cause trouble again|and that you've learned a lesson from your detention.
(Yuki grabs your legs and pulls you out.)|Young lady, what were you doing in there?
(Yuki taps on your shoulder.)|Young lady, what are you doing?
Which book are you looking for?
Hello again my little pet girl.|Which book are you looking for?
Which book are you looking for?
Try the literature section.  From the|main aisle, second shelve to your left.
Young lady, what were you doing in there?
Young lady, what were you doing?
Is there anything else you need?
(She gives you an angry look.)|What do you want now?
